name: MaudeView Watchlist Manager Agent
description: Manage TradingView watchlists and chart symbols via natural language. Create, rename, and delete watchlists. Add and remove symbols. Color-code and flag symbols. Control chart symbols, resolution, type, and navigation.

skills.name: Watchlist Management
skills.description: Create, rename, delete watchlists. Add/remove symbols. Flag and color-code symbols.
examples: Create a watchlist called Tech Stocks
Add NASDAQ:AAPL and NASDAQ:GOOGL to my watchlist
Remove NASDAQ:TSLA from my active watchlist
Color all my crypto symbols red

skills.name: Chart Control
skills.description: Set chart symbols, resolution, type, currency, and navigate charts.
examples: Set the chart to NASDAQ:AAPL on the daily timeframe
Go to January 1, 2025 on the chart
